STRUCTURES_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: structures_spawn_chance
STRUCTURES_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Affects the spawn chance of all structures (surface, underground, traders). Vanilla default is 0.46 so this mod reduces it on default. (default = 0.30; vanilla = 0.46; 33% = 0.10; 66% = 0.20; 150% = 0.45; 200% = 0.60; 300% = 0.90)

VILLAGES_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: villages_spawn_chance
VILLAGES_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Affects the spawn chance of all villages (groups of structures on the surface). Vanilla default is 0.05 so this mod reduces it on default. (default = 0.035; vanilla = 0.05; 33% = 0.012; 66% = 0.023; 150% = 0.053; 200% = 0.070; 300% = 0.11)

WALLSEGMENT_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: 01wallsegment_spawn_chance
WALLSEGMENT_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Affects the spawn chance of the megastructure wallsegment with tower. Wiki entry with images: https://github.com/AreYSerious/betterruins/wiki/mega-structures#01-wallsegment

LOOT_NERF.name: loot_nerf
LOOT_NERF.comment: The higher the value the more the loot is being nerfed. 0 = no nerfs; 0.5 = 30-40% reduced loot; 1 = 60-70% reduced loot; ... Affects the loot of all structures in the game to a certain extend.

SCHEMATIC_DOOR.name: schematic_door
SCHEMATIC_DOOR.comment: Defines the chance the door Blueprint can spawn in structures. High value means higher chance. Set to 0 to disable spawning. Will not disable the item.

SCHEMATIC_BED.name: schematic_bed
SCHEMATIC_BED.comment: Defines the chance the bed Blueprint can spawn in structures. High value means higher chance. Set to 0 to disable spawning. Will not disable the item.
